data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Faro, Portugal to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Faro, Portugal
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Faro who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary: On average, 49 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Faro, Portugal.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
There are 458,700 people living in the state of Faro. Only about 16,142 might be believers.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Faro. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Gujarati people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Gujarati people.
Father, convict the 16,142 believers in Faro to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Faro, Portugal.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Faro, Portugal find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

location.name: Faro
